page.title: 14Western Esplanade Businesses
page.content: The Posthouse Hotel is situated in the centre of the city between the port and the Central station. The hotel belongs to Trusthouse Forte. The 15 storey hotel is well designed and there is a heated swimming pool. The Central swimming baths is situated on the Western Esplanade, and it has two pools. The main pool is 110 ft. by 48ft. and it is 16 ft. deep, and it has an Olympic standard diving stage. Southampton Driver Education Centre is situated on the West Quay Road, and it offers courses in car driving and motor cycle riding for beginners or advanced drivers. The Evening Echo office was opened in 1870. It was bombed in World War ll. and was rebuilt in 1955. They also produce the Southampton Advertiser which comes out every Thursday.
